name: FNF Sunday Test
description:
It's Sunday from Week "Vs. Sunday" Friday Night Funkin Vs. Sunday! Play as Sunday and mad Sunday with electric guitar! Credits do really go to bbpanzu for making the Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Sunday mod! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Hold space and press any other arrow key for secondary sound

Press B, N, M for additional sounds

Secret Key = ??? ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Friday Night Funkin Vs. Sunday mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/300849
